_description: James Ryman, A song of Repentance — six quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Amende we vs while we haue space / For why nowe is þe tyme of grace’

CULEe112.First Lines:
That holy Clerke seint AugustyneSeith now is tyme forto
                    inclyneAnd graunte vs grace to dwell in blisffor why now is the tyme
                    of grace…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Amende we vs while we haue spaceffor why nowe is the tyme of
                    grace
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 215-16.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 243; 1977, 215-16.
